## Citation

Scholars who wish to use the data compiled here in their own work are kindly asked to include the following reference:

    Brambor, Thomas, Johannes Lindvall, and Annika Stjernquist. 2017. 
    “The Ideology of Heads of Government, 1870–2012.” Version 1.5. 
    Department of Political Science, Lund University.
